summary: App with UTR-based reward system (100 + 50 bonus) and withdrawal feature being built. Withdrawal feature (amounts: 100, 200, 500, 1000 with UPI ID) is being added in small steps due to repeated build failures.
architectural_notes: Build failures occur when requests are too complex; implement features in small incremental steps
UTR entry gives users 100 + 50 bonus automatically
known_issues: Withdrawal feature build has failed multiple times; must be added in small steps (amount selection first, then UPI input)

existing_features.title: Create a new Withdrawal page (frontend/src/pages/Withdrawal.tsx) that displays four withdrawal amount buttons: ₹100, ₹200, ₹500, and ₹1000. The user should be able to tap a button to select that amount, with the selected amount visually highlighted. Style it consistently with the existing dark navy/gold theme.

Add a 'Withdraw' navigation entry to the bottom navigation bar (BottomNav.tsx) or make the Withdrawal page accessible from the Account page via a 'Withdraw' button, so users can navigate to the new Withdrawal page.

new_feature_requests.summary: Add withdrawal section where user can select amount (100, 200, 500, 1000 rupees) and enter UPI ID to request withdrawal
